item.title: notes
item.description: Notes Add SSH key ssh-keygen cat .ssh/id_rsa.pub 取得ssh key 加入gitlab function function(可有參數或無參數){ return 值 } function addSum(){ let sum = 0 //當執行return function時也給於 sum return 的數值, //再執行時sum的值是上次return的值<br> return (num)=>{ sum = sum +num return sum } } const add = addSum()// closure 的addSum現時值為0 console.
